title: The Hiding
description: Aubrey Masen never gets anything college, men…life. Clinging to hope, she returns to her childhood home, only to find old pain and ancient heart-ache awaits. When an adventure into the Montana backcountry becomes a deadly nightmare, she is saved by someone entirely unexpected, and alarmingly different. Finch Connell is a mystery, with gleaming eyes and uncanny strengths. Saving a woman's life can’t change what he is, but loving her might change who he is, forever.Will they find salvation in each other's arms? Or will the federal agents who hunt them strike a fatal blow, ending all hope for them both?
author: Alaura Shouse
